statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_management;
SELECT vulnerability_name, priority_level FROM vulnerability_management;
SELECT vulnerability_name, remediation_status FROM vulnerability_management WHERE priority_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_management ORDER BY priority_level DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, priority_level, remediation_status FROM vulnerability_management WHERE vulnerability_id = 2;
SELECT vulnerability_name, priority_level FROM vulnerability_management;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_management WHERE priority_level > 5;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name FROM vulnerability_management WHERE remediation_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_management ORDER BY priority_level ASC, vulnerability_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vulnerabilities FROM vulnerability_management WHERE priority_level <= 3;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level='High';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, tracking_status FROM vulnerabilities JOIN vulnerability_tracking ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_tracking.vulnerability_id;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE tracking_status='Open' ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC;

SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, tracking_status FROM vulnerability_tracking LEFT JOIN vulnerabilities ON vulnerability_tracking.vulnerability_id = vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id WHERE vulnerability_name LIKE 'SQL Injection%';
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, remediation_step FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC;

SELECT vulnerabilities.vulnerability_name, vulnerability_tracking.tracking_status FROM vulnerabilities JOIN vulnerability_tracking ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_tracking.vulnerability_id WHERE vulnerability_tracking.tracking_status = 'Open' ORDER BY last_updated_at DESC;

SELECT vulnerabilities.vulnerability_name, vulnerability_tracking.tracking_status, vulnerability_tracking.last_updated_at FROM vulnerabilities JOIN vulnerability_tracking ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = vulnerability_tracking.vulnerability_id WHERE tracking_status = 'Closed' GROUP BY vulnerability_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_reports ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_reports WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_system FROM vulnerability_reports WHERE severity_level < 2;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT scanner_name, scan_date, scan_results FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level, affected_system FROM vulnerability_reports;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_reports WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT scanner_name, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, action_type, action_description FROM vulnerability_reports JOIN remediation_actions ON vulnerability_reports.vulnerability_id = remediation_actions.vulnerability_id;

SELECT vulnerability_reports.vulnerability_name, vulnerability_scans.scan_date, remediation_actions.action_description FROM vulnerability_reports JOIN vulnerability_scans ON vulnerability_reports.vulnerability_id = remediation_actions.vulnerability_id JOIN remediation_actions ON vulnerability_reports.vulnerability_id = remediation_actions.vulnerability_id ORDER BY vulnerability_scans.scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM Vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, remediation_steps FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level < 3 ORDER BY vulnerability_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vulns FROM Vulnerabilities;
SELECT * FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 5 ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 3
SELECT tracking_id, time_logged, notes FROM VulnerabilityTracking WHERE vulnerability_id = 7 ORDER BY time_logged DESC
SELECT * FROM VulnerabilityManagement WHERE status = 'Open' AND due_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT vulnerability_id, remediation_date, remediated_by_user FROM RemediationHistory WHERE vulnerability_id = 5
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scan;
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerability WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM asset WHERE owner = 'Admin';
SELECT asset_id, name, ip_address FROM asset ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_id, COUNT(*) FROM remediation GROUP BY vulnerability_id;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability WHERE severity > 7 ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM vulnerability_scan WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01' AND scan_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT asset.name, asset.owner, vulnerability.name FROM asset INNER JOIN vulnerability ON asset.asset_id = vulnerability.vulnerability_id WHERE asset.owner = 'Admin';

SELECT v.name AS Vulnerability_Name, r.remediation_date AS Remediation_Date, a.name AS Asset_Name FROM vulnerability v INNER JOIN remediation r ON v.vulnerability_id = r.vulnerability_id INNER JOIN asset a ON r.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE r.remediation_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT v.name AS Vulnerability_Name, vs.status_name AS Status FROM vulnerability v INNER JOIN vulnerability_status vs ON v.vulnerability_id = vs.vulnerability_id WHERE vs.status_name <> 'Resolved';
